title: If you think fizz is strong post your champion pool here
body:
just do it I'm not interested in your tears and excuses.

I won't give you any particular pool size... But I will judge you silently if its too big or too small.

replies.body:
My champion pool: {{champion:105}} 



feelsbadman
I'll admit, I giggled.

Fizz used to smash me hard until I bought the little fucker and stared playing him. He had some very glaring weaknesses which I learned to exploit. He's still a major pain to lane against though.

> [{quoted}](name=XelNiya,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=XOMQOpgW,comment-id=000700010000,timestamp=2016-05-30T22:15:55.240+0000)
>

Oh my.

> [{quoted}](name=XelNiya,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=XOMQOpgW,comment-id=000700010000,timestamp=2016-05-30T22:15:55.240+0000)
>
> Fizz used to smash me hard until I bought the little fucker and stared playing him. He had some very glaring weaknesses which I learned to exploit. He's still a major pain to lane against though.

He does have arguably the weakest pre-3 in the game. Even though he can all in you at level 3 he'll go through mana pretty quick. Also don't blow you're combo on him when he has his trollpole ready. Coming from someone who use to be a Fizz main and still plays him a lot I think those are the weaknesses you're talking about.

> [{quoted}](name=stealthfox94,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=XOMQOpgW,comment-id=0007000100000001,timestamp=2016-05-30T22:27:56.340+0000)

Even though he can all in you at level 3 he'll go through mana pretty quick.** Also don't blow you're combo on him when he has his trollpole ready**. Coming from someone who use to be a Fizz main and still plays him a lot I think those are the weaknesses you're talking about.

Spot on here with every thing, especially the bolded part.

> [{quoted}](name=XelNiya,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=XOMQOpgW,comment-id=00070001000000010000,timestamp=2016-05-30T22:31:57.515+0000)
>
> Spot on here with every thing, especially the bolded part.

Brand is an example of that. A smart Brand can actually beat Fizz by baiting his troll pole. However most Brands I've face just blow their entire combo at once and Fizz dodges all of it and proceeds to kill him.

> [{quoted}](name=XelNiya,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=XOMQOpgW,comment-id=000700010000,timestamp=2016-05-30T22:15:55.240+0000)

I don't think he is overly strong. I think his tank build is annoying and not really want he was designed for. My champion pool literally has nothing to do with my opinion concerning him and his playstyle.

Well that's a lovely response. You didn't even post your own champ pool and made it clear you plan to judge people in your OP. Grow up.

If it concerns you so much, {{champion:26}} {{champion:420}} {{champion:161}} are what I'd probably put as my mains, though I play others depending on bans / picks, and what I actually feel like playing. I mostly support, and again, I don't think he is overly strong. Simply annoying when built tank.

Seriously, grow up.

And yes my response was fucking lovely and yes I'm silently judging you for your incredibly small champion pool list. Simple stuff

Saying you're silently judging me means you're not actually silently judging me. You're openly judging me. And I'm asking for your champ pool.

Not sure what the heck I've done to piss you off so badly, but I enjoy my ranked games and don't really care so much when I face a fizz. So not sure what you want out of me.

I am a mid main. If I am told I am going mid in a timely manner I'll just play whatever I've got but the 4 here are the go to champs.

edit

also I don't think fizz is that strong. He's just another assassin

I think that's a fine selection. I only listed those 3 because those are my typical go to champions since I mostly go Top / Support, more so support than top. Though I do own all the champions and know how to sufficiently play many of them.

> [{quoted}](name=Lazypeon100,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=XOMQOpgW,comment-id=0000000000010000000000000000,timestamp=2016-05-30T23:00:07.159+0000)

three isnt much, but its enough for an opinion. 

who do you play in support mostly?
Mostly Zil or Vel'koz, though if we need a tank I like Leona / the occasional braum. If my lane partner wants a more relaxed lane phase and I think it'll work with the team, I'll go raka or janna.

> [{quoted}](name=Lazypeon100,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=XOMQOpgW,comment-id=000000000001000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-05-31T00:02:16.786+0000)

buys janna for aggressive lane, 
is told someone plays her for passive,
cries inside

I mean, I do play her aggressive if my lane partner wants to play aggressive. But more often than not, when I'm janna, my partner never actually wants to go in / make trades. I can be aggressive on my own, but at that point, I could always just pick a champion who is simply better suited towards that goal.

My champion pool is personally {{champion:75}} {{champion:11}} {{champion:24}}  and I'm fine with Fizz. I think it's also linked to the kind of champ you play. Playing squishies likely to be os'ed you're more likely to hate fizz, I guess.

Well I play Yi both toplane and jungle, Jax top and jungle and Nasus top.
Ofc I play sometimes other champs but clearly not to the extent I play those. I just like to chill with relatively simple kits and still do ok with it (it's actually pretty hard when you face champs with loaded kits, hard to not be kited/do plays)
I also love(d) {{champion:45}} , but I'm just a nostalgic of him prerework where he had an instant stun and way more reliable kit yet nobody complained and he was sitting at a pretty low winrate :s
Remember the fizz matchup, it was so unwinnable with full AP build I just rushed athenes-banshee and it actually got somewhat even.
Tank fizz is a joke

Yep.

A mastery 7 fizz main (and yasuo but that's a different topic) and I have been building mejais almost every game since the itemization changes, he's really strong right now, at least in whatever skill range I'm playing in

Support: Leona (100%)
Jungle: Hecarim (>90%), Amumu
